name: nonchronological
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not following the order in which a series of events happened: The book has a nonchronological structure. The action of the play is presented in non-chronological order. Related word
chronological
More examplesFewer examplesThe order of the chapters is non-chronological.The book has three different narrators and is told in a series of nonchronological fragments.The non-chronological order of events made the film a bit confusing.Customers complained when their bank statements listed the transactions in a non-chronological order.
